docs.text: Welcome to GenAiDay2Operations This repository serves the purpose of providing an example for a full project structure with all best practices impelmented. Like CI/CD, Application Tracing, Security etc. Project layout mkdocs/ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. site/ # The directory where the site is built. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. Build the documentation and push it to the gh-pages folder mkdocs build && cp -R site/* ../docs/
